price: Isaan lamaan ishee irraa nyaatani; qaamni saalaa isaanii isaaniif mul’atte; baala jannataa irraa of irratti maxxansuu eegalan, Aadam (ajaja) Gooftaa isaa didee dogoggore.
arabic: فَأَكَلَا مِنۡهَا فَبَدَتۡ لَهُمَا سَوۡءَٰتُهُمَا وَطَفِقَا يَخۡصِفَانِ عَلَيۡهِمَا مِن وَرَقِ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۚ وَعَصَىٰٓ ءَادَمُ رَبَّهُۥ فَغَوَىٰ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-akalā min'hā fabadat lahumā sawātuhumā waṭafiqā yakhṣifāni ʿalayhimā min waraqi al-janati waʿaṣā ādamu rabbahu faghawā
